ygData.subject: Re: How to develop skill at high levels?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Someboady correct me if Ah m wrong, but Ah seem ta recall readin somewhere that ceramic vanes were bugged an did not give tha trivial message.  It might
ygData.messageBody:
>From: bonecrkr@...
>
>I'm currently making arrows with Large Nocks, Wood Shafts, Field
>Points and ceramic vanes. Unfortunately, it is now becoming
>teminally expensive to level the skill up (at least with the ceramic
>vanes). They are not trivial but are no longer driving my skill up
>at an acceptable rate. Before I flush more pp away, could someone
>with level 200 skill tell me if I should stick with ceramic vanes
>(if so, until when) or move on to cheap components with steel shafts (until
>when) and then cheap components with blade points.

Someboady correct me if Ah'm wrong, but Ah seem ta recall readin' somewhere
that ceramic vanes were bugged an' did not give tha trivial message. It
might be another part but Ah'm purty shur that it be tha ceramic vanes. Ah
would try makin' tha next hardest arrow in yer progression chart (as long as
it don' call fur ceramic vanes that is).

Lincus
E'ci
